: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus traps two of her fingers in his mouth, playing around.

Rodimus Prime: I got your hand, what'cha gunna do?


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Elita:

Elita giggled a lot, she touched with one of her little hand his 
daddy's chin. 





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus picks up his daughter, holding her close.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I can tell that you are going to be a strong girl.
> 
>

>

wrote:

the

> >

would

they
